definition: American TV series/abbr. for 美國電視劇|美国电视剧
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe

sentences.english: When Donald Trump watches The Walking Dead, he thinks of us.
sentences.chinese: 川普看美劇《行屍走肉》的時候會想到我們。

sentences.english: The Atom is officially coming alive on Arrow.
sentences.chinese: 原子俠真的要出現在美劇《綠箭俠》中了。

sentences.english: Both shows return from holiday breaks in January.
sentences.chinese: 這兩部美劇都將會在一月迴歸。

sentences.english: The response from the media and our viewers has been extremely gratifying.
sentences.chinese: 這部美劇不論是媒體還是觀衆的反響都非常棒。

sentences.english: 'The Walking Dead' will be back for a third season of zombie goodness.
sentences.chinese: 我們將能看到超好看喪屍美劇《形式走肉》的第三季。

sentences.english: If American shows were Coca-Cola, British dramas seem more like a cup of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 如果說美劇是可口可樂，那英劇則是一杯咖啡。

sentences.english: Last year, with no access to the Internet, I watched American dramas the whole day.
sentences.chinese: 去年，我在斷網的春節裏，看着無盡的美劇。

definition: to watch a TV series etc regularly/to binge-watch
cartoons and comics/animes and mangas/cartoon (animated movie)/anime
barrage (military)/"bullet screen", function which allows viewers to post on-screen comments in videos, movies etc in real time/danmaku (video game subgenre)
to overdose on supplementary medicine/to cram too hard
